I know the difference between the two.  I've watched all the G1 series epis=
odes so I do know that.  The Seekers are far more sentient than the Sweeps =
and to me far more intelligent.  So one question does remain, is Dark Rodim=
us a living extension of Rodimus that somehow remained after he got rescued=
?  And is there a possibility that Tucson will have to face off with the re=
al Rodimus to get him to realize that he has a serious demon to get rid of?=
  And could there be a demon to slay on Tucson's end too?  After all he isn=
't without his weaknesses too.  I guess what I'm asking is, could this be a=
 sort of test for both Rodimus and Tucson Prime, who seem to suffer from la=
ck of self confidence and anger management?  And can they actually help eac=
h other overcome these weaknesses and win a victory in the name of their fa=
ctions?  Just curious about the storyline in general.

Perpetually on the m=
ove and constantly busy. 

On Aug 14, 2011, at 9:07 AM, Super Cyclonus <sup=
ercyclonus@...> wrote:

> "The temptation to form premature theories =
upon insufficient data is
> the bane of our profession." - Sir Arthur Conan=
 Doyle
> 
> Heya!
> 
> Just thought I would throw that out there before we =
continue to far.
> Is anyone confused by anything thus far? I would imagine=
 so in some
> cases. :)
> 
> Of course I can't reveal all the hidden answer=
s yet before the end,
> but I figured I would open up the floor to anyone w=
ho had a question
> or comment I can answer to. Perhaps I can clairify some=
thing your
> character does know?
> 
> One thing I can clairify is that whe=
n Tuscon seemed to think that when
> Noctorro said Seekers he was not talki=
ng of Scourge's troops. Seekers
> generally reference mechs that turn into =
Jets. Scourge's guys are
> called Sweeps and are different.
> 
> Be careful=
 of assumptions, they can lead you down wrong paths. This is
> not a critis=
m but just helpful advice since we all do it from time to
> time :)
> 
> - =
Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-12-17718624
